title: Canary Testing
subtext: Testing new software by releasing to a small group of users
author: RayMathew

description.title: Canary Testing
texts: Canary testing, or canary release is a technique to reduce the risk of introducing a new software version in production by slowly rolling out the change to a small subset of users before rolling it out to the entire infrastructure and making it available to everybody.
Also referred to as canary deployments, incremental, staged, or phased rollouts, canary releases are a best practice in devops and software development.
